comment: Will do. She is so happy receiving her first dose. Luckily she didnt feel any fever after the dose. She is a strong woman. So do you

            :degree (s3 / so))

            :ARG0 (s4 / she)

            :time (a2 / after

            :domain (s6 / she))
      :snt5 (d4 / do-02

            :mod s3))
